features: Too coarse a grind, too little coffee, or insufficiently tamping the grounds before brewing can all lead to inadequate pressure for a proper brew. 2)It is important to note that the amount of espresso extracted will vary depending on the grind size and amount and reprogramming may be needed when the size and amount are adjusted.Filter type:Reusable
VORTEXT Water Flow Technology - The exclusive showerhead design evenly saturates coffee grounds, resulting in rich flavor extraction.
Smart-Clean System - The automatic cleaning cycle improves the performance of your coffeemaker.
Adjustable Keep Warm Time - Select how long the heated carafe plate keeps coffee warm after brewing, from 30-120 minutes or off.
Brew Strength Selector - Customize your cup with an option for slowing down the brewing process for stronger coffee.
body.description: Brew coffee just the way you like it. This 12-cup* coffeemaker features VORTEXTM Technology, which evenly saturates coffee grounds for full and rich flavor extraction using optimal water temperatures. You can change the brew strength with the option for a slower brewing process and stronger cup of coffee. Set how long you want to keep coffee warm after brewing with the adjustable keep warm timer (options for 30, 60, 90, 120 min, and OFF). Sneak-A-Cup™ Technology lets you pour a cup of coffee before the rest of the pot has brewed--all without any drips or spills. Other useful features include: Smart-Clean automatic cleaning cycle, 12-cup* Duralife™ glass carafe, washable brew basket, and “Keep Hot” heated carafe plate to make sure coffee is hot when you’re ready to drink it. *cup equals approximately 5 oz. (varies by brewing technique)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VORTEX Water Flow Technology The exclusive showerhead design evenly saturates coffee grounds, resulting in rich flavor extraction. Keep Warm Countdown Timer Shows how long the keep warm will remain on. Smart-Clean System The automatic cleaning cycle improves the performance of your coffeemaker. Adjustable Keep Warm Time Select how long the heated carafe plate keeps coffee warm after brewing, from 30-120 minutes or off. VORTEX Water Flow Technology Keep Warm Countdown Timer Smart-Clean System Adjustable Keep Warm Time

Sneak-a-Cup This feature temporarily stops the flow of coffee so you can pour your first cup before brewing ends without making a mess. Nonstick “Keep Hot” Carafe Plate The heated carafe plate is nonstick for easy cleanup. 12-Cup Capacity Fast brewing for up to 12 cups* of coffee. Specifications Vortex Water Flow Technology Black Stainless Steel Smart-Clean System Adjustable Keep Warm Time Brew Strength Selector Sneak-a-Cup Duralife Glass Carafe Nonstick “Keep Hot” Carafe Plate

Brew Strength Selector Customize your cup with an option for slowing down the brewing process for stronger coffee. DuralifeGlass Carafe The 12-cup glass carafe is designed for non-drip pouring. Easy Clean, Washable Brew Basket The brew basket is easy to remove for quick cleanups. Compatible with basket style filters. Digital Clock with Controls The large digital display shows you the time and lets you program the brew cycle.

BLACK+DECKER 12-Cup* Coffeemaker, Programmable, Exclusive VORTEX Technology, Stainless Steel Finish, CM1331S Brew coffee just the way you like it. This 12-cup*coffeemaker features VORTEX. You can change the brew strength with the option for a slower brewing process and a stronger cup of coffee. Set how long you want to keep coffee warm after brewing with the adjustable keep warm timer (options for 30, 60, 90, 120 min, and OFF). Other useful features include Smart-Clean automatic cleaning cycle, 12-cup* Duralife glass carafe, washable brew basket, and “Keep Hot” heated carafe plate to make sure coffee is hot when you’re ready to drink it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best basic coffee makers out there...
reviews.reviewText: Standard filter size, nice distributed water pattern onto coffee grounds, large tank if needed, Bold setting, clock, future brew timer, stay warm timer.Bold setting: Eh don't really notice a difference.Future brew timer: Must have, it works perfectly.Stay warm timer: This is huge to me, you can set it to 3 different amounts of time to keep your coffee warm. I use the 1 1/2 hour bc I don't know when I'll be up and about day to day. And it has displays a timer on the front how much longer the coffee warming element has left. It is just a really great simple feature.Standard coffee filter size. It's a 12 cup, I make 6 cups before bed. Then wake up to fresh brewed coffee every morning and don't have to make it at that moment, groggy. Very nice, simple and pragmatic coffee maker for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes great coffee at a great price
reviews.reviewText: First, if you are one of the coffee maker searchers who want an alarm when its done making the coffee move on. Why you would need an alarm to let you know it's ready is beyond me. If I make coffee, I want it now and I'm hanging out waiting for it. Actually, every coffee maker I've ever owned has a built in alarm as it loudly sputters when done to get all the water through the machine.That said, this makes greats coffee, the count-down timer on the machine lets you know how many minutes are left until it automatically turns off the heating plate. Easy to set the time and use. Water in the back and coffee in the the front and it uses normal sized round filters. I have always used a mesh plastic and metal round filter in my makers as I find it easier to clean and mine fit perfectly. Very solid construction. My only issue is you need to try and not pour the coffee to your cup to quickly because it can start to pour back along the lip and make a mess. Take your time and its fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This is a good coffee maker. Makes good tasting coffee and I like that you can set the time and program it to make coffee at a specific timeOf day. Nice that it also has a cleaning feature on it. U am also vision impaired so it is nice that the clock lights up in blue and is easy for me to see. I have it 4 stars though because the water reservoir where you fill up water, the opening is small so I always spill some water trying to pour it in but other than that everything is good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Liking the programmable option
reviews.reviewText: This has been a good coffee maker so far. I like to set it the night before and have had no problems. Coffee tastes good and stays hot for 2 hours then warmer can be reset. I did notice a little drip when pouring when the pot is very full but if you hold the lid tight, no problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker!
reviews.reviewText: After functioning well for a decade, our old B&D coffee maker finally bit the dust. Given we liked the old one, I decided to replace with the same brand, but a slightly upgraded model. I thoroughly read the reviews, and was a bit concerned about those who said it was hard to fill with water and the pour spout didn't work well. But, decided to buy anyway given our good experience with our previous coffee maker. I'm glad I decided to buy it. Day five of using it now, and it's great. Makes a good cup of coffee, it's super quiet, the "strong" feature actually does slightly increase the strength of the coffee, and it's attractive on the counter, not taking up a lot of space. I like that it has a "clean" function, and the auto timer works perfectly so our coffee is ready when we stumble out of bed every morning.I am also happy to say that any of the negative reviews about filling the water well and pouring the coffee haven't happened to us. I'm unsure why people struggle with these two things, but it's not our experience at all.I highly recommend this machine. Good value and good coffee. We're happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to Pour Without Spilling!!!
reviews.reviewText: Makes a nice cup of coffee. That said, if I had known how difficult it is to pour a cup of coffee, without spilling the contents of the carafe as I pour, I would never have purchased this coffee maker (on July 13, 2022) — never ever in 100 years! Whoever designed the pouring spout of this carafe was either a newbie engineer, or an outright sadist. Find a better designed coffee maker if you value your nerves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Don't need the instructions to brew a pot of coffee. Simple and direct. Easy pour pot with no spill

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Design is flawed, coffee brew basket does not drain fast enough into carafe
reviews.reviewText: Don't waste your time or money. I normally like black and decker for their consumer lines. Not this time. When Mr Coffee gave up working right after Christmas, I needed a new machine. Picked this one because it was programmable.Howeve, there is a design flaw that kills the use of this coffee maker. The filter basket fills up too fast, and floods the grinds above the filter, which in turn clogs the spring fed drain into the carafe. Now, if anyone e from B$D is going g to remind me that I need to snap the lid shut, it was every time it was used. I've had this less than two weeks and it never brewed a clean pot of coffee.The problem is in the spring activated drain . I have turned off the machine, numerous times to diagnose this problem opened the lid to see grinds overflow the filter, than close the lid (shaped down into place), only to open it five minutes later, still holding the same water when I turned off the machine. I found I was not putting the normal amount of grinds into the machine in fear of the overflow and yet two things happened. First the brew basket still overflowed, and the coffee was terribly weak. Sorry Black and Decker, this machine fails the coffee test. And, I'm returning it back to Amazon. (0) stars for continued failure to brew a clean regular strength pot of coffee.
